Comment 77: 
In the attachment to comment #76 we can see that a pointer held by the program is
pointing to a block that has been collected.  That suggests that this is another case in
which the GC is collecting something inappropriately.

math/big.nat.make(0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0xc208db25a0, 0xc208db2660, 0xdeaddeaddeaddead,
0xc2098b3e40)
	/usr/local/go/src/pkg/math/big/nat.go:76 +0x6e
math/big.nat.set(0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0xc208db25a0, 0xdeaddeaddeaddead, 0xc2098b3ec0,
0x4, 0x8)
	/usr/local/go/src/pkg/math/big/nat.go:111 +0x48
math/big.(*Int).Set(0xc208db2600, 0xc208db2560, 0xc208db2540)
	/usr/local/go/src/pkg/math/big/int.go:69 +0x54
_Status changed to **Accepted**._
